definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

sentences.english: He vacillates from agile, amiable, and arch to repetitive and awkward.
sentences.chinese: 他搖擺不定的敏捷，和藹可親，並拱重複和尷尬。

sentences.english: A best commendatory letter request that you have a good attitude.
sentences.chinese: 和藹可親的態度是最好的推薦信。

sentences.english: Devil often presents itself a friendly disguise in front of mankind.
sentences.chinese: 魔鬼常以一種可親的姿態出現在人類面前。

sentences.english: You are the most genial person I know.
sentences.chinese: 你是我認識的最和藹可親的人。

sentences.english: He kept chopping about from kindness to cruelty towards his pupils.
sentences.chinese: 他對學生們忽而和藹可親，忽而冷酷無情。

sentences.english: The nurse always treated the sick and wounded with kindness.
sentences.chinese: 這位護士總是以藹然可親的態度對待傷病員。

sentences.english: She parted from her young friend in the kindliest tones.
sentences.chinese: 她用最和藹可親的語調和她的年輕的朋友道了別。

sentences.english: The human affairs of the company and downstage, simpatico to the person.
sentences.chinese: 公司的人事和前臺，都對人和藹可親。

sentences.english: Personally, Bohr is one of the most amiable colleagues I have ever met.
sentences.chinese: 就我而言，玻爾是我見到的最和藹可親的同事之一。
我覺得他和藹可親，富有魅力。

sentences.english: Edward is very amiable, and I love him tenderly.
sentences.chinese: 愛德華非常和藹可親，我也很喜愛他。

sentences.english: Most of my customers are friendly, though not to the point of awkwardness.
sentences.chinese: 我的客戶大多友善可親，不至於到尷尬的地步。

sentences.english: Forsyth said. “She was always smiling, always laughing.
sentences.chinese: 她總是笑容滿面，和藹可親。
她對每一個人都和藹可親。

sentences.english: These two creatures, sand and short grass, seem to her like two sweet gods.
sentences.chinese: 在她看來，沙與草這兩個造物就像兩位可親的神祗。

sentences.english: God is more gentle and compassionate that you would ever hold possible.
sentences.chinese: 制物主好盡是馴良可親且慈悲的，是您一背所具有的。

definition: spacious and well-lit/open and clear/(of character) optimistic/cheerful/carefree
variant of 淳樸|淳朴[chun2 pu3]
